Detailed Description

MWCAP_HDMI_VIDEO_TIMING.

Records HDMI timing.
Related data type are
MWCAP_HDMI_SPECIFIC_STATUS
MWCAP_INPUT_SPECIFIC_STATUS
Related functions is:
MWGetInputSpecificStatus
